title: Chapter 158 The Shepherd and the Dog
content: A SHEPHERD penning his sheep in the fold for the night was about to shut up a wolf with them, when his Dog perceiving the wolf said, “Master, how can you expect the sheep to be safe if you admit a wolf into the fold?’

book.title: 伊索寓言 Aesop's Fables
